title: Get £25 off a stylish fitness watch – plus free delivery!
content:
Your body is the greatest instrument you’ll ever own, so it’s important to take the time to tune into it. With the Aquarius fitness watch, keeping tabs on your health couldn’t be easier. Not only does it track your steps, distance and calories burned, but it even monitors your heart rate and assesses just how well you’re sleeping. And, with this exclusive deal, you can get this life-changing gadget for just £24.99, instead of the usual £49.99 – and you won’t even have to pay a penny for delivery!

Get £35 off now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Available in a wide range of stylish colours, including bronze, gold and silver, this Aquarius AQ115 HR fitness watch also includes:

  • A 24-hour dynamic heart rate monitor
  • Auto sleep tracking
  • A pedometer
  • Text and calendar alerts
  • A camera ‘selfie’ function
  • Find my iPhone
  • Access to Twitter, Facebook and WhatsApp alerts
  • Regular ‘move’ reminders

This fitness watch can be synchronised with the following devices: iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 Series, iPhone 6/6 Plus Series, iPhone 7/7 Plus Series – iOS8 and above, Android systems 4.4. or above, and Bluetooth 4.0+ smartphones.

Simply download DayDay Band from the App Store or Google Play Store to get started!

Offer ends 18/06/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get £25 off now

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. author: Steve Newell
